Test Name: RET Gene Full Analysis for Multiple Endocrine Neoplasia Type 2 Syndrome
Purpose: To detect and characterize RET gene mutations associated with MEN 2 for accurate diagnosis and management.
Container: EDTA tube for whole blood or standard buccal swab collection device
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, thermocycler, electrophoresis apparatus, spectrophotometer, capillary electrophoresis system (e.g., ABI 3500 Genetic Analyzer)
